DesignatedVerifierId.description: The role, user or user group associated with the digital verification setup detail.

DigitalVerificationSetupId.description: The parent digital verification setup associated with the digital verification setup detail.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a record indirectly; for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the digital verification setup detail record.

PostVerificationMessage.description: The message that is displayed after a verification is performed.

PreVerificationMessage.description: The message that is displayed before a verification is performed.

VerifierRank.description: Specifies the rank of the verifier that provides the verification.
